# Runtime Configuration

> Configuring .NET runtime behavior through runtimeconfig.json, MSBuild properties, and environment variables. Settings control garbage collection, threading, globalization, and JIT compilation. Use `runtimeconfig.json` for per-app settings; environment variables for system-wide configuration.

*Topics available: 8*

- [Compilation config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/compilation.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure how the JIT compiler works for .NET apps.
- [Debugging profiling config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/debugging-profiling.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure debugging and profiling for .NET apps.
- [Garbage collector config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/garbage-collector.md): Learn about runtime settings for configuring how the garbage collector manages memory for .NET apps.
- [Globalization config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/globalization.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure globalization aspects of a .NET Core app, for example, how it parses Japanese dates.
- [.NET Runtime config options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/index.md): Learn how to configure the .NET runtime using configuration settings.
- [Networking config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/networking.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure networking for .NET apps.
- [Threading config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/threading.md): Learn about the settings that configure threading for .NET apps.
- [WPF config settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/wpf.md): Learn about the settings that configure WPF for .NET apps.
